entity.name: Advanced_brep_shape_representation
entity.description: An advanced_brep_shape_representation is a type of shape_representation in which the representation items are specialisations of manifold_solid_brep entities. These specialisations differ from the more general B-rep in that they shall only use explicit geometric forms for their face and edge geometry. The face geometry is restricted to elementary surfaces, swept surfaces or B-spline surfaces.
